abstract: Like its most of its peers, Bank of America had a rough third quarter. Last week, it reported a 32 percent drop in net income, including a stunning 93 percent drop at its investment bank.
lead_paragraph: Like its most of its peers, Bank of America had a rough third quarter. Last week, it reported a 32 percent drop in net income, including a stunning 93 percent drop at its investment bank.

headline.main: Tightening the Belt at Bank of America
